amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funds for the Community Development Block Grant program and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the funding for the Community Development Fund including the CDBG program and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 342 (Roll no. 434).
